creator: Holger.Thomsen@T-Systems.Com
text:
Please add support for Weblogic 6.1 and 7.0 to the weblogic-Element of the 
ejbjar-Task.
If I build an Ejb-Jar with the current version of the ejbjar-task (using ejbc 
on deploy-time), I can use this jar under Weblogic 6.0 but not under Weblogic 
6.1.
The server tells me that the jar has been recompiled and after that my 
application doesn´t deploy correctly.

I haven´t tested Weblogic 7.0 yet. But I will do this asap.
The problem also exists with Ant 1.5 alpha (nightly) from April, 9th.

This might be related to or correlate with Bugs #7548 and/or #7871.

Ant further info on this. Ultimately ejbjar passes a simple jar into the
Weblogic tools so I'm not sure how this would be a problem with Ant unless the
generic jar is somehow malformed?
creator: conor@apache.org

text:
If there is nothing special to keep in mind for newer versions of BEA WLS, 
please add these versions to the documentation of the weblogic-element in the 
manual section for ejbjar-task.

This can be of relevance for our Quality Management.
